tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE warehouse_inventory (
    warehouse_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id UUID,
    product_name TEXT,
    quantity INT,
    location TEXT
)
CREATE TABLE warehouse_locations (id INT, location_name VARCHAR(50), address VARCHAR(100), capacity INT)
CREATE TABLE inventory (product_id INT, location_id INT, quantity INT, last_updated TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE distribution_views (view_id INT, view_name VARCHAR(50), warehouse_locations_ids ARRAY<INT>, total_inventory INT)

CREATE TABLE warehouse_locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    city VARCHAR(100),
    state VARCHAR(50),
    zip_code VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE inventory (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(100),
    quantity INT,
    location_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES warehouse_locations(location_id)
)

CREATE TABLE distribution_centers (
    dc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    dc_name VARCHAR(255),
    location_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES warehouse_locations(location_id)
)

CREATE TABLE distribution_plan (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    dc_id INT,
    item_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (dc_id) REFERENCES distribution_centers(dc_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES inventory(item_id)
)

CREATE TABLE inventory (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    warehouse_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (warehouse_id) REFERENCES warehouse_locations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE distribution_mapping (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    inventory_id INT NOT NULL,
    distribution_center_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (inventory_id) REFERENCES inventory(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (distribution_center_id) REFERENCES distribution_centers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE distribution_views (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    view_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    view_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    distribution_center_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (distribution_center_id) REFERENCES distribution_centers(id)
);
